name: simple-raytracer
description: `simple-raytracer` works as a standalone version of the JS raytracer found in [distracer.io](http://distracer.io), which was inspired by [jsRayTracer](https://github.com/vjeux/jsRayTracer). It's purpose is to offer a simple raytracing interface that can be run locally in, in a distributed fashion on a server or even in browsers
author: David Dias <daviddias.p@gmail.com>
